short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate to specific parts of the current domain. It's like making a custom navigation menu for yourself on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 The CurbPage Browser Extension: Simplify Your Web Navigation 🌐

🔍 Overview:
Welcome to CurbPage, your ultimate tool for streamlining web browsing! 🚀 This extension lets you create custom navigation menus on any website, offering quick access to relative URLs. Perfect for web developers, WordPress enthusiasts, graphic designers, cybersecurity experts, and database administrators. 🌈

👁 Enhanced Overview:
CurbPage is a versatile, user-centric tool designed to revolutionize web browsing. Ideal for professionals working with SQL databases, it allows saving of SQL queries as relative URLs, streamlining data management and cybersecurity practices. 💻

⬇️ Installation:
Easy! Just download CurbPage from the Chrome Web Store and click the extension icon to start. 🌟

🌈 Features:

Custom Navigation Menus: Tailor your online navigation 🧭
Organized URL Groups: Efficiently manage relative URLs 🔗
Bookmark Efficiency: Reduce clutter with smart bookmarking 📑
SQL Query Integration: Save SQL queries for quick access 💾
👌 Comprehensive Features:

Customize menus for streamlined access 🛠️
Organize URLs for better browsing 📊
Smart bookmarking for a cleaner browser 🧹
Save SQL queries directly in your browser 🚀
🔎 Accessibility:
CurbPage is fully accessible, with adaptable color themes and compatibility with screen readers and keyboard navigation. 🌍

🌐 Dynamic URL Use Cases:

Web Developers: Quick access to tools and API endpoints 🛠️
WordPress Developers: Efficient navigation to admin and settings ⚙️
Graphic Designers: Easy reach to files and resources 🎨
Many More: Tailored URLs for bloggers, social media managers, and tech enthusiasts 📱
💡 How to Use:

Install: Download and click the extension icon 📥
Create Menus: Organize your links in the menu editor 📝
Access Menus: Find your menu in the Chrome toolbar 🌐
Sync Settings: Keep consistent across browsers 🔄
📣 Support and Community:

Feedback: Contact us at curbsoftware@gmail.com 📩
Privacy: Your data is secure and private 🔒
Contribute: Join our GitHub community 🤝
License: Under the MIT License 🔑
✨ Enhance your browsing efficiency and organization with CurbPage! 🚀🌐
